channel.title: Feed on Made By Nathan
channel.description: Recent content in Feed on Made By Nathan

item.title: Daily Calvin & Hobbes RSS feed (with embedded images)
item.description: Yahoo Pipes is fantastic. I wasn’t a big fan of yahoo in the past, but their pipes service is amazing. Its great for sprucing up a not-so-well implemented RSS feed, and lets you create feeds from virtually anything on the web. Here’s a daily Calvin and Hobbes RSS feed that parses the comic image from the linked page, and drops it in the feed itself. Perfect for Google Reader.

item.title: wimp.com rss feed
item.description: I found out about http://www.wimp.com last year, and have been watching their daily videos ever since. Its a simple website that offers 5 or 6 daily videos on a range of topics, such as science, comedy and innovation. And thats all there is. No bells and whistles, just a daily list of 5 videos. The videos are awesome, but I always wanted to watch them with google reader via rss.
